poojaServices.title: Janmastami Puja
poojaServices.description: Janmastami is the festival of Krishna, the God of wealth and prosperity. People perform special puja to invite Him into their homes. Invite prosperity by booking a traditional Krishna-Puja.

poojaServices.title: Diwali Pooja
poojaServices.description: Diwali is the festival of lights, celebrated with joy and devotion. Book a Diwali Pooja to seek blessings for prosperity and happiness.

poojaServices.title: Ganesh Chaturthi Pooja
poojaServices.description: Ganesh Chaturthi marks the birth of Lord Ganesha, the remover of obstacles. Celebrate with a special Pooja to invite His blessings.

poojaServices.title: Navratri Pooja
poojaServices.description: Navratri is a nine-night festival dedicated to the Goddess Durga. Participate in the Pooja to seek her blessings for strength and prosperity.

poojaServices.title: Maha Shivaratri Pooja
poojaServices.description: Maha Shivaratri is a significant festival dedicated to Lord Shiva. Book a Pooja to seek His blessings for peace and prosperity.

poojaServices.title: Holi Pooja
poojaServices.description: Holi is a festival of colors and joy. Celebrate with a Holi Pooja to seek blessings for prosperity and happiness.

poojaServices.title: Makar Sankranti Pooja
poojaServices.description: Makar Sankranti marks the transition of the sun into Capricorn. Celebrate with a Pooja to invite prosperity and good fortune.

poojaServices.title: Pongal Pooja
poojaServices.description: Pongal is a harvest festival celebrated in South India. Book a Pooja to express gratitude for the bountiful harvest and seek blessings for prosperity.

poojaServices.title: Baisakhi Pooja
poojaServices.description: Baisakhi marks the harvest festival in Punjab. Celebrate with a Pooja to seek blessings for prosperity and happiness.
